Title: Paisajes pa ti Exhibition by Manuel Hidalgo
Description: Paisajes pa ti (Landscapes for You) by Manuel Hidalgo at the José Pérez Guerra Museum in Cortelazor la Real. Opening on September 13, 2025 at 7:00 pm. On view until September 28.
Keywords: Manuel Hidalgo, exhibition Cortelazor, Paisajes pa ti, contemporary art Huelva, José Pérez Guerra Museum, Laecléctica Gallery, September 2025 exhibitions, art in Sierra de Aracena, painting and engraving
